sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		Function as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		EmpID,
		surrogatekey,
		Region,
		Status,
		EmpFunction,
		Level,
		Role,
		StartDate,
		EndDate,
		iscurrent,
		processtime
	)) ~> sink1

transformations.name: Select1
transformations.script:
source1 select(mapColumn(
		EmpID,
		Region,
		Status,
		EmpFunction = Function,
		Level,
		Role,
		StartDate,
		EndDate
	))~> Select1

transformations.name: DerivedColumn1
transformations.script:
Select1 derive(iscurrent = 1,
		surrogatekey = '123456789abcdfeghijkl',
		processtime = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn1
